@JamesMcNellis: Life on the @visualC team: My last checkin attempt failed because my changes broke a test that was written when I was two years old.

posts.message: If you're #ASPNET developer & want to add Metro UI to your application please read this post http://www.emadmokhtar.com/2013/02/how-to-create-metro-ui-asp-net-application/
posts.caption: www.emadmokhtar.com
posts.description: If you’re ASP.NET developer, you’re concern about the User Interface/Design of your application and you notice Metro/Modern UI is neat and great UI, but How I can make my ASP.NET application look like Windows 8 application? Can I do that? The answer is Yes you can, there’re bunch of (free/paid) tool...

posts.message: the city with the longest name ever! "Llanfairpwllgwyngyllgogerychwyrndrobwllllantysiliogogogoch"  is a large village and community on the island of Anglesey in Wales. a prize for the one that will pronounce it perfect :D

Nuitex Company is seeking to hire a Part-Time Web Designer
If you are interested please send your updated CV

I want to know about the experience of independent/part-time consultants in Egypt. I know Yasser Makram. Any others?
